channel.title: Smaller videos for the colorblind?
channel.description:
Hey there,
My cousin has Achromatopsia, which basically means he see's things like a really good B & W tv. He can discern between blue and yellow if their really rich colours aswell.
I have a 200gb + video collection and he wants some, but usually he has to wear special glasses to help him see contrast better
is there anyway I could find a program that makes files smaller for him by changing them to black and white, and or change the contrast to make everything about 20% brighter?
thanks,
YoYo

item.title: Smaller videos for the colorblind?
item.dc:creator: FireTime
item.description:
^That. Also using the nVidia control panel or Ati(amd) settings you can pump up the gama/contrast or adjust hue settings to get ever further controll.

As for games many casual games could be played, word of goo, eufloria, possibly vvvvvv but not sure how it would play due to the fact that some areas have bright foregrounds and bright backgrounds.(try watching a game play video first?)

Also thinking about your wind water comment psychonauts is an amazing game that should be playable.
